# Changes to Synergies

- Nerf Ice: Freeze chance 30% → 25% ; Special Defense 4/12/30/60 → 4/12/25/50

# Changes to Pokémon & Abilities

- New ability for Salandit line: Fire lash ; PP 60 → 100
- Buff Outrage (Axew, Druddigon): 150/200/250% ATK → 300% ATK at all tiers
- Buff Axew line: Def: 2/4/8 → 5/10/15 ; Speed: 56 → 62
- Buff Tepig line: HP 70/140/210 → 75/150/230 
- Nerf Vivillon: PP 90 → 100 ; now targets the highest SPEED enemy **within range**. Removed ally buffs.
- Nerf Kakuna: Def 8 → 6

# Misc

- Removed Buyer Fever scribble
- Changed Technologic scribble to give tools at stages 2 and 4 (from stages 3 and 15)
- New Scribble: Unown Spell
- New Scribble: The Chosen Ones
- New Town Encounter: Kingambit
